title: Breeders' Cup's Rotondo on Preakness Betting Strategies (Audio)
itunes:title: Breeders' Cup's Rotondo on Preakness Betting Strategies (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Peter Rotondo Jr, Vice President of Media & Entertainment at The Breeders' Cup, and Bloomberg racing enthusiast Gary Ettl, on betting strategies for the Preakness.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
